## Introduction

R Markdown combines narrative text, executable R code, and formatted output
to create reproducible analysis documents. It allows explanation and analysis
to coexist in a single document.

## Reflection

R Markdown makes it easier to combine narrative writing, R code, and math
in a single reproducible workflow. Knitting ensures that code is executed
freshly each time, preventing outdated results and improving transparency.
